short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly enrich X/Twitter profile to Check DM Availability, Streamline Your Twitter Messaging!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enrich the information of X users with real-time data with just one click, and use the DM Checker to determine if a user is available for direct messaging.

HOW TO USE:
1. Enter the X/Twitter usernames or user links.
2. Click the start button.

v1.0.1 UPDATE LOG
- auto skip unavailable user.
- when other errors occur, automatically pause the task, you can resume it after a while.
